hero.title: The first Saudi platform for advertising services
hero.description: Adstation is a unified platform connecting top advertising agencies and companies to handle ad requests professionally.

section2.title: Your advertising partner that saves you time, effort and cost
section2.description: Adstation helps business owners and marketing and advertising managers get all their advertising and publicity work done, from logo design to designing and implementing all types of billboards, product stands, and everything else they need...

section3.title: Explore over 70 advertising services waiting for you
section3.description: Adstation is an integrated platform specializing in advertising requests, bringing together the largest group of advertising agencies and companies, all in one place, according to professional standards.

section4.title: Product and application logo design services
section4.description: Adstation provides factories and importers with specialized solutions in product design and its various applications, from logo to distribution. Experienced agencies.

section5.title: Point of Sale Production Display Solutions
section5.description: Adstation partners with companies, factories, and designers to deliver display solutions that showcase your products in grocery stores, supermarkets, and other retail outlets.

section6.title: Billboards: All types of outdoor advertising and promotional panels
section6.description: At Adstation, you will find the best producers of project fencing panels, unipolar panels, wall panels, facade panels, and building roof panels.

hero.title: Who We Are
hero.subtitle: The smart future of traditional advertising
hero.description: The first Saudi platform to bring together the best traditional advertising service providers under one digital roof, making your advertising experience simpler and faster.

brandSection.title: adstation
brandSection.description: It's your smart choice for managing and implementing everything related to traditional advertising—from logo design to achieving widespread distribution across all applications and advertising and promotion solutions with high quality, ease, and greater professionalism.

storySection.title: Adstation Story
storySection.description: At the heart of the Kingdom's evolving business environment, among the challenges facing many business owners, marketing and advertising managers is the difficulty in obtaining reliable traditional advertising services that support their business growth. AdStation was born: a platform that combines expertise, professionalism, and technical solutions, providing easy access to the best traditional advertising providers in all cities of the Kingdom.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Our vision is to be the leading platform for traditional advertising solutions in the Kingdom within the next four years, expanding from the Gulf to the world.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to enable small and medium-sized companies to reach their audience through well-planned, high-quality traditional advertisements at fair prices, with simple digital execution.

values.title: Our Values
values.experience: Experience: We have a dedicated team that combines market knowledge and forward-looking vision.
values.innovation: Innovation: We use technology to create advanced and accessible advertising solutions.
values.transparency: Transparency and Collaboration: We guarantee a clear experience, fair prices, and measurable results.
values.clientCentric: Client-centric: We design our services based on our clients' needs, enabling them to achieve their advertising goals.

main.title: Our Services
main.heroDescription: Integrated advertising solutions with more than 70 services... and expansion continues
main.description: At Adstation, we offer a variety of advertising and promotional services through partnerships with more than 40 professional providers, ensuring quality and diversity with the best options from design to implementation. We provide innovative solutions to meet your advertising needs.

list.title: Creative Design Solutions
list.description: Identity design offering a wide range of professional design solutions with more than 20 services

list.title: Printing Solutions
list.description: We provide all types of printing methods in implementing various types of printing

list.title: Outdoor Advertising Solutions
list.description: An integrated network of distinguished advertising service locations capable of providing everything related to outdoor signage work

list.title: Indoor Signage Solutions
list.description: We excel in implementing all forms of indoor signage with the highest quality standards

list.title: Exhibitions and Events
list.description: Our expertise extends to implementing exhibition wings, designing display platforms, and various events, providing necessary services for our clients commercial participations

list.title: Point of Sale Product Solutions
list.description: We have extensive experience in designing and implementing high-end promotional models with integrated solutions for product marketing within malls and commercial centers

list.title: Advertising Campaign Solutions
list.description: Organization and booking of outdoor advertising campaigns with strategic locations to ensure maximum spread and effectiveness

creativeDesign.title: Creative Design Services
creativeDesign.description: We offer you a comprehensive variety of creative design services, from logos to prints, digital applications, product design solutions, and more.
creativeDesign.sectionTitle: The list of design services and solutions includes

services.title: 3D design for facades and display platforms
services.description: We employ designers specialized in this type of design for products and services, to achieve speed and efficiency according to the latest practices.

services.title: Product design, packaging, and display applications
services.description: We employ designers and agencies specialized in this type of design for the products and applications you need, according to the latest practical and professional practices.

services.title: Logo Design (Projects, Companies, Events)
services.description: Access top creative talent—from independent designers to expert agencies—with previews of their work before you commit.

services.title: 3D design for commemorative shields and gifts
services.description: We know the needs of institutions and companies to excel in their activities and we provide specialized providers in designing this type of design.

services.title: Design of commercial prints and corporate brochures
services.description: From our list of partners specializing in designing and creating advertising print designs with new and traditional templates that suit your aspirations

services.title: Interior design for restaurants, retail, and sales spaces
services.description: We have expert partners who design branches and points of sale, such as restaurants and retail stores, to suit your brand and applications.

services.title: Digital Brand Identity Design and Development
services.description: To have an online presence, we offer you designers specialized in this type of digital design solutions efficiently and quickly according to your marketing goals.

printing.title: Printing services and solutions
printing.description: Whatever the type of printing, order it via adstation We provide you with instant quotes and follow up on your order until delivery – all from one platform and with the click of a button.
printing.sectionTitle: Our list of services and printing solutions includes

services.title: Digital Printing
services.description: High-quality digital printing services for banners, posters, and promotional materials with quick turnaround times.

services.title: Offset Printing
services.description: Professional offset printing for large volume projects including brochures, catalogs, and corporate materials.

services.title: Large Format Printing
services.description: Specialized large format printing for billboards, vehicle wraps, and outdoor advertising displays.

services.title: UV Printing
services.description: Advanced UV printing technology for durable, weather-resistant prints on various substrates.

services.title: 3D Printing
services.description: Innovative 3D printing solutions for prototypes, promotional models, and custom displays.

services.title: Screen Printing
services.description: Traditional screen printing for textiles, promotional items, and specialty applications.

services.title: Variable Data Printing
services.description: Personalized printing solutions for direct mail campaigns and targeted marketing materials.

outdoorAdvertising.title: Services and solutions for all types of panels
outdoorAdvertising.description: We provide you with all the services and solutions for external panels adstation Available in various sizes and materials, whether for road signs, facades, or temporary billboards, we offer everything you need for outdoor advertising. Our experts understand your requirements and negotiate to achieve the best results.
outdoorAdvertising.sectionTitle: Our list of services and panel solutions includes

services.title: Advertising Project Fences Hoarding Panels
services.description: We deliver high-quality advertising fence solutions through trusted partners, tailored for both temporary and permanent project needs.

services.title: Manufacture of giant billboards on roads and buildings
services.description: ADSTATION is proud of its partner service providers who specialize in manufacturing and executing giant billboards on roads, buildings, and roofs, with high quality and professional standards.

services.title: Cladding panels and raised letters
services.description: High-quality cladding panels and raised letters in various materials including aluminum composite, acrylic, and stainless steel, with lighting options.

services.title: Exhibition boards
services.description: Exhibition facade panels, internal information displays, temporary roll-ups and stands, plus illuminated panels for professional visual appeal.

services.title: Suspended Column Panels
services.description: Our lampposts are available in a variety of styles, including single, double, illuminated, and seasonal, all designed to be clearly and attractively displayed on streets, events, and temporary or permanent advertisements.

services.title: Interior panels for facilities, companies, and buildings
services.description: Professional indoor signage including department signs, parking signs, and event displays with high quality and clear organization.

services.title: Paintings
services.description: ADSTATION partners offer integrated solutions for designing and implementing various types of 3D billboards with innovative ideas that attract attention.

indoorSignage.title: Indoor Signage Solutions
indoorSignage.description: Professional indoor signage solutions that enhance your brand presence and improve customer experience in any indoor environment.

services.title: Retail Store Signage
services.description: Custom indoor signage solutions for retail stores, boutiques, and shopping centers to enhance brand presence.

services.title: Office Building Signage
services.description: Professional signage for office buildings, corporate headquarters, and business centers with modern designs.

services.title: Mall & Shopping Center Signs
services.description: Comprehensive signage solutions for malls, shopping centers, and commercial complexes.

services.title: Restaurant & Hospitality Signs
services.description: Custom signage for restaurants, hotels, and hospitality venues to create memorable dining experiences.

services.title: Healthcare Facility Signage
services.description: Specialized signage for hospitals, clinics, and healthcare facilities with clear wayfinding systems.

services.title: Educational Institution Signs
services.description: Signage solutions for schools, universities, and educational institutions with informative displays.

services.title: Digital Indoor Displays
services.description: Interactive digital signage and display systems for modern indoor environments.

exhibitionsEvents.title: Exhibition and Event Services and Solutions
exhibitionsEvents.description: Professional partners from freelancers and agencies in adstation We are ready to provide quality event services that achieve your goals with unforgettable participation and make an impact.
exhibitionsEvents.sectionTitle: Our list of services and solutions for exhibitions and events includes

services.title: Renting all kinds of advertising stands
services.description: ADSTATION, in collaboration with its partners, seeks to offer pop-up and roll-up stand rental services with printing, aiming to provide economical and effective solutions for clients attending small or limited-capacity events.

services.title: Rental of screens and interactive devices
services.description: At ADSTATION, we aim to facilitate our clients' access to professional advertising screen booking and installation services, as well as interactive devices with audiences, from specialized providers, to ensure a comprehensive service for your event.

services.title: Design and implementation of Suites and booths
services.description: According to your budgets and marketing goals, our partners transform them into designs specific to you with innovative options, and we negotiate with them to provide a comprehensive service with minimal effort.

services.title: Event and conference theatre design
services.description: We provide experts and specialists in designing and equipping theaters and facades for events and activities according to the type and purpose of the event.

services.title: Photographing and documenting events
services.description: Through our partners, we guarantee that you will receive professional photography and editing of events and activities.

pointOfSale.title: Point-of-Sale Product Services
pointOfSale.description: In cooperation with professional partners in adstation We strive to provide unique point-of-sale product display solutions, aimed at enhancing the presence of your brand's products in the customer's shopping experience and increasing sales. From interior design and visual creativity to creating an attractive shopping environment, we save you a lot of time searching for specialized suppliers who can make a difference in your success in the market.
pointOfSale.sectionTitle: Our list of services and product solutions includes

services.title: Brand Ambassador & Promo Team Management
services.description: Managing merchandising teams and promoting them as brand ambassadors at points of sale are services that Adstation coordinates with partners specialized in this type of field.

services.title: Promote products on store shelves
services.description: Enhance shelf presence with customized visual branding solutions that motivate shoppers and increase in-store sales.

services.title: Product display systems
services.description: Design and implement attractive floor display stands and kiosks to highlight new products in main aisles, enhancing brand presence and increasing sales.

services.title: Shopper Research
services.description: Design and conduct studies on products and shopper audiences, and identify opportunities and threats.

services.title: Management and design of tasting campaigns
services.description: To have an online presence, we offer you designers specialized in this type of digital design solutions efficiently and quickly according to your marketing goals.

advertisingCampaigns.title: Booking Services Advertising Campaigns
advertisingCampaigns.description: Soon on adstation Outdoor advertising campaign booking service in streets, malls, airports, metro and bus stations
advertisingCampaigns.sectionTitle: Every day...more services, stronger partnerships To help you grow

hero.title: We are more than just a platform.. We are your partner for
hero.subtitle: Why Adstation?
hero.description: In the world of traditional advertising, many marketing managers waste time and effort searching for the ideal advertising partner.

localLeadership.title: Local Leadership
localLeadership.description: The first specialized Saudi platform that integrates traditional advertising services with digital solutions to keep pace with market development.

diverseExpertise.title: Diverse Expertise
diverseExpertise.description: A diverse team of experts in advertising and marketing, and sales managers for local and global brands.

smartSolutions.title: Smart Solutions
smartSolutions.description: We combine the power of traditional advertising with the efficiency of digital technology to give you the best return on investment.

fullTransparency.title: Full Transparency
fullTransparency.description: Clear prices, real evaluations for providers, and continuous follow-up from order to completion.

spendingEfficiency.title: Spending Efficiency
spendingEfficiency.description: Our experts negotiate on your behalf to achieve the best prices from trusted providers, with maximum value for investment.

betterOptions.title: Better Options
betterOptions.description: We submit your request to more than 5 providers in each category, so you can choose from multiple offers and ideas that achieve superior results for you.

savingTimeAndEffort.title: Saving Time and Effort
savingTimeAndEffort.description: Our team follows up on your requests step by step, ensuring fast completion without you bearing the burdens of communication and coordination.

diverseAndIntegratedServices.title: Diverse and Integrated Services
diverseAndIntegratedServices.description: We cover more than 50 traditional advertising services, and continuously expand through new partnerships with specialized service providers.

wideGeographicalCoverage.title: Wide Geographical Coverage
wideGeographicalCoverage.description: Our services reach all cities in the Kingdom and ensure fast completion of your projects and advertising campaigns at the lowest cost, with speed and high reliability through a wide network of advertising service providers.

hero.title: Join Our Partners
hero.subtitle: Your smart partner for digital growth
hero.description: Adstation, the first digital platform that connects advertising service providers with their clients, aims to provide integrated services to businesses and organizations. With an ambitious vision, we seek to facilitate access to advertising services through smart partnerships, achieving shared goals that align with digital transformation and create greater opportunities for success for the advertising sector.

benefits.title: Additional Digital Sales Channel
benefits.description: We showcase your services to thousands of targeted customers through our digital platform, increasing your revenue.

benefits.title: Free Promotion with No Upfront Costs
benefits.description: We cover the costs of marketing your services, without any financial obligations from you.

benefits.title: Service Promotion Campaigns
benefits.description: We design marketing offers and campaigns tailored to your audience, enhancing the appeal of your services and increasing demand.

ctaSection.title: Join Our Partner Network!
ctaSection.description: Make your advertising services accessible to thousands of customers! Register your data and information with us and start growing your business today.

formSection.title: Partner Registration Form
formSection.subtitle: Complete your partner application with detailed information

form.logoDescription: Upload company logo (PDF, JPG, PNG) Max file size 5MB.
form.workSamplesDescription: Upload multiple work samples (PDF, JPG, PNG). Max 5 files, 10MB each.
